SELECT xra.id, xra. NAME NAME, xra.word_num wordNum, xra.picture_path picturePath, xra.type, xra. LEVEL LEVEL, xra.create_id createId, xra.create_date createDate, xra.update_id updateId, xra.update_date updateDate, xra.enable_flag enableFlag, xe.score, xe.update_date, dd. NAME levelName, dd1. NAME typeName FROM xl_exercise xe LEFT JOIN xl_read_article xra ON xe.read_article_id = xra.id LEFT JOIN xl_dic_detail dd ON dd.dic_id = 15 AND dd.name_val = xra.`level` LEFT JOIN xl_dic_detail dd1 ON dd1.dic_id = 16 AND dd1.name_val = xra.type WHERE xe.student_id = #{studentId} order by xra.id desc limit #{start},#{end}
